@lewisholdennz Even more confusing is that when I left I was only Kiwi, now I’m British too! (Actually completely irrelevant but still…)
@lewisholdennz Ok objectively that doesn’t look sarcastic!! 😉
@lewisholdennz Am I allowed to come home? I’m going to buy property and get a job. Sorry.
@eey0re oh, actually misunderstood. Phone sees existing card. So that app will read it. Ignore me!
@eey0re ah ha. I see. I know that cats are a different standard! Can you read existing device with https://t.co/IArKyHNeLw ?
@eey0re I think the reader "activates" card emulation on phone. Just a guess, but don't think the phone is always pretending to be a card.

The House of Lords' interpretation of article 50: notification to withdraw from EU can itself be withdrawn. https://t.co/yTvcNAdQQk
.@NicolaSturgeon Why not lobby for England & Wales to secede from the UK? Scotland and NI, as UK, remain in EU. E&W negotiate with EU.
Was thinking the exact same thing. https://t.co/MR2ypuneon
@eey0re before I went to check I thought they'd be being satirical. But no. They're part of the problem. This is not good.
@chrishipkins because a major constitutional change requiring years of post-vote negotiation is exactly the same as not changing a flag.
.@realDonaldTrump free people's what?
The idea of an EU army doesn't sound like such a bad idea. It could invade the UK and liberate us.
EU flags should be flown at half mast today.
@dreykickit All of a sudden Ken Leee doesn't seem so funny any more.
This is no longer a United Kingdom.
@danserif I will visit in August. Well done, grown ups!
